dict.acceptation: 垃圾，废物；断枝，碎块；废话；社会渣滓；
废弃；拆毁；搞垮，贬低；从…上除去细枝或枝条；

sent.orig: Office work-ers who want the rubbish taken out write 'BASURA'instead of 'TRASH' on the boxes.
sent.trans: 办公室职员若想让人把垃圾拿走，就得在垃圾桶上写“BASURA”（垃圾）而不是“trash”。

sent.orig: Remember that cigarettes are trash. Cigarette butts must go into trash cans or bigger dumpsters.
sent.trans: 别忘了香烟是垃圾。香烟头应扔进垃圾箱或大一点的垃圾堆里。

sent.orig: One trash can will be for rubbish or trash.
sent.trans: 一个垃圾桶是用来盛放垃圾或废物的。

sent.orig: Simpson, we slide ever closer to a cultural abyss filled with trash and nothing but trash.
sent.trans: Simpson杀妻案之类新闻。我们正进一步滑向文化深渊，不能自拔，身边除了垃圾，还是垃圾。

sent.orig: It's not hard to put trash in a trash can.
sent.trans: 有一个人说：把垃圾丢进垃圾桶并不难。
